info.name: Google Calendar - Bigger Calendar, Autohide Tools
info.description: Hides the search bar on top and the toolbar on the left. Hover over the pink stripes to access the hidden tools. Also makes calendar more usable by highlighting today, shading weekends and making the calendar borders just a bit darker. This style borrows from style 50430.
info.additionalInfo:
Version 1.5
